content:
Our Team Researchers, students, and engineers building the future.
Dr. Jake Doliskani Principal Investigator
Assistant Professor at the Department of Computing and Software at McMaster University. Previously faculty at TMU and NSERC post-doctoral fellow at the Institute for Quantum Computing (UWaterloo). PhD in Computer Science from the Ontario Research Center for Computer Algebra. Interests: Post-Quantum Cryptography, Quantum Computing, Applied Cryptography. Visit Website â†— Current Members Lu Chen PhD Candidate
Focused on Learning With Errors (LWE) and lattice-based cryptography.

Researching Quantum Machine Learning (QML) and variational algorithms.

Our Team

Researchers, students, and engineers building the future.

Dr. Jake Doliskani

Principal Investigator

Assistant Professor at the Department of Computing and Software at McMaster University. Previously faculty at TMU and NSERC post-doctoral fellow at the Institute for Quantum Computing (UWaterloo). PhD in Computer Science from the Ontario Research Center for Computer Algebra.

Interests: Post-Quantum Cryptography, Quantum Computing, Applied Cryptography.
